mapper.insert: insert into post(small_post_id, name, description, demand, pay, min_internship, workplace, delivery_deadline, hr_id,work_city, status) values (#{postSmallType.id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{demand}, #{pay}, #{minInternship}, #{workPlace}, #{deliveryDeadline}, #{humanResource.id}, #{workCity}, #{status});
mapper.select: select post.name, post.id, post_small_type.name as postSmallTypeName, post.min_internship, post.pay, post.delivery_deadline, post.work_city, post.status from post_small_type, post where post.small_post_id = post_small_type.id;
select id from post_small_type where name = #{name}
